meanings.definition: To cut off the foreskin of (a male) as a religious rite.
meanings.sent1: The priest was circumcising the baby boy during the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The doctor will be circumcising the newborn for cultural reasons.
meanings.sent3: During the ritual, the elder accidentally started circumcising the wrong doll.
meanings.sent4: The tradition of circumcising symbolizes a new beginning for the child.
meanings.sent5: The act of circumcising is a significant part of many cultures around the world.

meanings.definition: To remove the foreskin from (a male) as a medical procedure.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon will be circumcising the patient in the operating room.
meanings.sent2: Parents often choose circumcising for their sons for health reasons.
meanings.sent3: The barber joked that he could start circumcising hair instead of beards.
meanings.sent4: The doctor's precision in circumcising was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The process of circumcising is a common practice in many hospitals.
